title: Enter the RECOVERY mode and restore the factory settings
answer:
If there is an upgrade package in the SD card, or the online update package has been downloaded, you can press the power button and the volume + button to enter the recovery mode in the off state. After then, you can press the volume up and down button, and then press the menu key to enter the appropriate function after selection. 

 Restore factory settings: On the home screen, click Settings > Backup and reset > Restore factory settings, and then click Reset the phone.
